comments.body:
Would it make sense to include a link to why these are the recommended contrasts in the reason? e.g. the links contained in the doc comments above?

(same for the failure reason of the other tester)
Can you add tests to flutter_test that exercise all these edge cases you're fixing here to ensure they continue to work in the future?
I expanded the test coverage and fixed similar issues to get text contrast working ... there were a lot of bugs in my implementation :(
Just curious, why the `1/3` change?  It seems like the comment above this line no longer fully holds.
When I used the semantics node, we ended up including the dpr transform. Now that I'm using the rect from the render box, this doesn't include the dpr transform
yikes, do we document / check that this is only used with RenderBoxes?

I added an assert. Currently, it is guaranteed that the renderObject will always be a RenderBox because the element finder above only returns Elements of `Text` or `Editable` widgets, which will always have RenderBox elements.
